hero.description: Guarantee: Originality, Quality and Price. Multiply equipment lifespan with flux-cored wire (FCAW) and hardfacing plates.

independence.short: This website and NanoWearTech Turkey operating in Turkey are not affiliated with the Iranian corporate structure at namadnanotech.com.
independence.full: This website and NanoWearTech Turkey operating in Turkey are not affiliated with the Iranian corporate structure at namadnanotech.com. Turkey operations are completely independent in supply, sales, service and warranty processes.
